item.title: 软银和东京电子的盈利可能因人工智能芯片需求而增长
item.description: 东京电子有限公司（Tokyo Electron Ltd.）和 Lasertec 公司将紧随芯片巨头 SK 海力士公司（SK Hynix Inc）和三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co.【原文：Tokyo Electron Ltd. and Lasertec Corp. will report earnings on the heels of chip titans SK Hynix Inc. and Samsung Electronics Co., which benefited from robust demand for high-bandwidth memory chips used in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 三星抢占人工智能风口，亚洲芯片股领导地位发生变化
item.description: 在寻找下一个人工智能行业佼佼者的过程中，外国投资者的买盘推动了三星电子公司股价的上涨，亚洲芯片股领导者的地位正在发生变化。【原文：A change is afoot in Asian chip stock leadership, as buying by foreign investors drives gains in shares of Samsung Electronics Co. amid a search for the next top performers in the artificial intelligence trade.】

item.title: 非农就业前两年期国债收益率降至 14 个月低点
item.description: 对政策敏感的两年期国债收益率跌至 2023 年 5 月以来的最低水平，因为交易员们都在关注即将公布的就业数据，以寻找有关美国降息幅度的线索。【原文：The policy-sensitive two-year Treasury yields dropped to the lowest level since May 2023 as traders fixated on upcoming jobs data for clues on the magnitude of US interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 日本零售交易商削减对墨西哥比索的看涨押注
item.description: 日本个人投资者将墨西哥比索兑日元的看涨押注降至今年最低，这表明国内加息可能会降低他们对国外高收益资产的偏好。【原文：Japanese individual investors cut bullish bets on the Mexico peso against the yen to the lowest this year, in a sign of how interest-rate hikes at home may reduce their appetite for higher-yielding assets abroad.】

item.title: 绝对能源公司任命新首席执行官，将争取更多时间偿还债务
item.description: 因欺诈调查而身价暴跌的泰国可再生能源公司 Energy Absolute Pcl 任命了新的首席执行官，并表示计划与债券持有人举行会议，以争取更多时间偿还债务。【原文：Energy Absolute Pcl, the Thai renewable energy company that has slumped in value amid a fraud probe, named a new chief executive officer and said it plans meetings with bondholders to seek more time to pay debt.】

item.title: 日本股市跌势加剧，Topix 指数面临调整
item.description: 由于日元走强和对美国经济健康状况的担忧打击了投资者的情绪，日本股市暴跌，基准的 Topix 指数从 7 月份的高点下跌了 10%以上。【原文：Japanese shares tumbled, with the benchmark Topix index falling more than 10% from its July peak, as a stronger yen and concern over the health of the US economy dealt a blow to investor sentiment.】

item.title: 需求困境抵消中东风险，石油将出现单周下跌
item.description: 由于世界两大经济体的需求担忧盖过了地缘政治风险加剧的影响，石油连续第四个星期下跌。【原文：Oil headed for a fourth weekly drop as demand concerns in the world’s two biggest economies overshadowed heightened geopolitical risk.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美国股市在就业数据公布前下挫。科技股收益继续令人失望。日本央行观察家重新评估加息步伐。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. US stocks sink ahead of jobs data. Tech earnings continue to disappoint. BOJ watchers reassess the pace of rate hikes. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 中国债券交易员在对中国人民银行的担忧中寻求避风港湾
item.description: 中国的债券交易商们正在市场的一个小角落里寻求庇护，以利用对进一步降息的押注，因为在创纪录的涨势中，官方反击的威胁降低了。【原文：China’s bond traders are seeking shelter in a little played corner of the market to take advantage of bets on further interest-rate cuts that come with a lower threat of official pushback at a record rally.】

item.title: 华侨银行因财富和交易收益而实现超预期利润
item.description: 华侨银行第二季度利润超出预期，原因是交易和财富管理费用大幅增长，帮助支撑了不温不火的贷款收入。【原文：Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp.’s second-quarter profit beat expectations, as a strong haul in trading and wealth fees helped to bolster tepid lending income.】

item.title: 人工智能芯片制造商 Cerebras 据称计划最快于 10 月上市
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，Cerebras Systems 公司是一家生产优化用于人工智能的半导体的初创公司，其首次公开募股的目标是在 10 月份启动。【原文：Cerebras Systems, a startup making semiconductors optimized for artificial intelligence uses, is targeting a launch for its initial public offering as soon as October, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 台湾企业债券发行量降至七年新低
item.description: 台湾今年的企业债券发行量创下了七年来的新低，原因是企业因预期当地利率已达顶峰并可能走低而缩减了发行量。【原文：Taiwan’s corporate bond issuance this year has hit a seven-year low, as companies scale back offerings on expectations that local interest rates have peaked and could move lower.】

item.title: 美国页岩油生产商承诺限制产量但仍将提高产量
item.description: 美国一些主要的页岩油生产商正计划在今年抽取比原先预计更多的石油，这表明全国供应量可能会超过许多公司承诺的小幅增长预期。【原文：Some leading US shale producers are planning to pump more oil this year than originally projected, a sign national supply could exceed the modest growth expectations many companies had pledged.】

item.title: 债券反弹，亚洲股市呼应美国股市跌势：市场综述
item.description: 周五，华尔街股市下跌，反映出对美国经济健康状况的不安，国债也随之走高。【原文：Asian equities were primed for selling Friday following declines on Wall Street that reflected unease on the health of the US economy and sent Treasuries higher.】

item.title: 安大略教师退休金支持 Bilt，现估值 32.5 亿美元
item.description: Bilt Rewards 是一家客户忠诚度计划提供商，可将租金付款转换成积分，用于兑换航空里程、酒店住宿、餐厅餐饮和其他福利。【原文：Bilt Rewards, the customer-loyalty program provider that converts rental payments into points for airline miles, hotel stays, restaurant meals and other perks, has raised $150 million in additional equity funding led by Ontario Teachers’ Pension Plan.】

item.title: 采矿业的阴霾
item.description: 早上好，周五快乐！我是乔吉，我在悉尼，为您盘点今天的头条新闻。【原文：Good morning and happy Friday, it’s Georgie here in Sydney with a roundup of the biggest stories to kick off your day.】

item.title: 世界最大铜矿工人拒绝必和必拓工资提议
item.description: 必和必拓集团在智利的工人在例行会谈结束时拒绝了该公司的工资提议，使谈判进程进入最后的调解阶段，以避免世界上最大的铜矿发生罢工。【原文：BHP Group workers in Chile rejected the company’s wage offer at the close of regular talks, thrusting the process into a final mediation phase in a bid to avoid a strike at the world’s biggest copper mine.】

item.title: Coinbase 全球实现盈利，第二季度收入翻番
item.description: 随着今年加密货币的复苏势头延续到第二季度，Coinbase Global Inc.【原文：Coinbase Global Inc. posted a profit and revenue doubled as this year’s cryptocurrency recover carried into the second quarter.】

item.title: 交易商国债持有量在拥堵困境中跃升至创纪录水平
item.description: 一级交易商持有的国库券数量创下历史新高，这表明就在政府计划加大发行力度之际，资产负债表已开始充盈。【原文：The amount of Treasury securities held by primary dealers rose to an all-time high, an indication that balance sheets are starting to fill up just as the government is slated to ramp up issuance.】

item.title: 微策略公司减记比特币缓存后出现亏损
item.description: 微策略公司（MicroStrategy Inc）在对其持有的价值约 145 亿美元的比特币进行减值计提后，连续第二个季度出现亏损。【原文：MicroStrategy Inc. registered a second consecutive quarterly loss after taking an impairment charge against the value of its roughly $14.5 billion in Bitcoin holdings.】

item.title: 科通芯城在科技股下跌中创下今年最大月度跌幅
item.description: 菲利普-拉丰（Philippe Laffont）的 Coatue Management 公司是全球最大的选股公司之一，由于科技股的暴跌，该公司 7 月份下跌了 3.6%，这是该公司今年以来最严重的月度亏损。【原文：Philippe Laffont’s Coatue Management, one of the world’s largest stock-pickers, tumbled 3.6% in July as a rout in technology shares fueled its worst monthly loss this year.】

item.title: 股市暴涨一天后回落，波动性卷土重来
item.description: 投资者希望度过一个平静的夏天，但却大失所望，因为股市动荡不安，八月的酷暑已经来临，刺激了美国股票指数的大幅波动。【原文：Investors hoping for a quiet summer are being sorely disappointed as turbulence pummels the stock market, spurring outsized swings in US equity indexes with the dog days of August now upon us.】

item.title: MercadoLibre 超出预期，利润同比翻番
item.description: 拉美电子商务和支付巨头 MercadoLibre 公司第二季度的业绩超过了分析师的预期，同时其金融科技平台的用户数量也创下了历史新高，这表明该公司的地域和产品扩张正在加速。【原文：MercadoLibre Inc., the giant Latin American e-commerce and payments firm, blew past analyst estimates in the second quarter while posting a record number of users for its fintech platform in a sign that its geographic and product expansion is picking up speed.】

item.title: Vertex 因囊肿性纤维化药物增长而上调收入预期
item.description: Vertex 制药公司上调了今年的销售预期，理由是其囊性纤维化药物的持续增长以及镰状细胞病新疗法的推出。【原文：Vertex Pharmaceuticals Inc. raised its sales expectations for the year, citing continued growth of its cystic fibrosis drugs and the launch of its new treatment for sickle cell disease.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利出售与 40 多亿美元私人贷款相关的债券
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）正在为发行债券寻找投资者，这将有助于卸下与私人市场基金 40 多亿美元贷款组合相关的风险。【原文：Morgan Stanley is sounding out investors for a bond offering that would help offload risk tied to a more than $4 billion portfolio of loans to private market funds.】

item.title: 南方公司称现有数据中心耗电量增加 17
item.description: 促使耗电量大幅增加的不仅仅是新建的数据中心。南方公司首席财务官丹尼尔-塔克（Daniel Tucker）周四表示，与去年同期相比，南方公司境内现有数据中心第二季度的用电量增加了 17%。【原文：It’s not just new data centers that are driving massive increases in power consumption. Existing data centers in Southern Co.’s territory used 17% more electricity in the second quarter compared to the same period last year, Chief Financial Officer Daniel Tucker said Thursday.】

item.title: 美联储减息步伐缓慢，市政债券创五月以来最大涨幅
item.description: 由于投资者担心美联储等待降息的时间过长，因而放弃股票转而投资固定收益资产，市政债券大举上扬，推动收益率创下七周来最大跌幅。【原文：Municipal bonds are staging a broad advance, pushing yields down the most in seven weeks as investors abandon stocks for fixed-income assets on concern the Federal Reserve is waiting too long to cut rates.】

item.title: 埃利奥特和其他贷款人与前麦克阿菲公司达成债务协议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，McAfee 的前企业业务原则上达成了一项协议，以调整其债务负担并获得 4 亿美元的新资金。【原文：McAfee’s former enterprise business reached a deal in principle to reshape its debt load and receive $400 million of new money, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 斯塔默收到英国央行的礼物--以及对其预算计划的警告
item.description: 英国首相基尔-斯塔默（Keir Starmer）的新政府为继承财政烂摊子而呻吟，但如果其自身的支出计划不出现意外，它也能为英国赢得软着陆的遗产。【原文：Prime Minister Keir Starmer’s new government groans about inheriting a fiscal mess, but it could also win the legacy of a soft landing for the UK if its own spending plans don’t send that awry.】

item.title: 索玛-布拉沃（Thoma Bravo）打破僵局，数日内向支持者返还数十亿美元
item.description: 在经历了几年相对贫瘠的交易之后，全球最大私募股权公司的支持者们都在考虑一件事：回报。【原文：After a relatively barren few years for deals, backers of the world’s biggest private equity firms have one thing on their minds: returns.】
